name: Solitaire Card Game by Mint
description:
If you like classic Solitaire, you're going to love this beautiful solitaire card game!

Train your brain with a new Solitaire experience each & every day. Download now to play the best classic Solitaire card game for free!

Fun Addicting Games of Classic Klondike & Patience Solitaire. It is an offline game which you can play solitaire on anytime and anywhere.

SOLITAIRE FEATURES:

Beautiful graphics
Klondike Solitaire Draw 1 card
Klondike Solitaire Draw 3 cards
Option for all winning deals
Auto complete
Unlimited free undos
High scores and personal statistics
Sound that can be turned on/off
No network required

For anyone who likes a free, easy, and fun solitaire game. It is all that you need for straightforward time-killing.
